name: Avoid Functions and Procedures using logical operators (or, and) in the "WHEN" clause of the SELECT statement (PL1)
description:
This rule searches all the PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Function and PL1 Procedures using the logical operators in a "WHEN" clause of the "SELECT" statement. If the result is greater than 0 then the procedure is listed as a violation.
Please notice that False Positives May be reported in case of Binary Operations
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Function and PL1 Procedures using the logical operators in a "WHEN" clause of the "SELECT" statement.

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Function and PL1 Procedures  full name
rationale: Including logical operators in the "WHEN" clause of a SELECT statement is to be discarded because it introduces complexity.
remediation: Try to reduce the use of logical operators in the WHEN clause
total: Number of PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Function and PL1 Procedures.
alternativeName: Avoid Functions and Procedures using logical operators (or, and) in the "WHEN" clause of the SELECT statement (PL1)

technicalCriteria.name: Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity
